mapper.update: update product_sku set product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sku_name = #{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sku_img = #{skuImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, untitile = #{untitile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, original_price = #{originalPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sell_price = #{sellPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discounts = #{discounts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock = #{stock,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select sku_id, product_id, sku_name, sku_img, untitile, original_price, sell_price, discounts, stock, create_time, update_time, status from product_sku where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select sku_id, product_id, sku_name, sku_img, untitile, original_price, sell_price, discounts, stock, create_time, update_time, status from product_sku
